---
title: "SPP for PLC"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
load("~/R/SPP/SPP.RData")
library(forecast)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
plc <- ts(PLC[,2], freq=365.25/7, start=2015+51/365.25)
plc %>%
  autoplot()
```

```{r}
plot(decompose(plc))
```

```{r}
training_plc <- subset(plc, end=length(plc)-3)
test_plc <- subset(plc, start=length(plc)-2)
fc_training_plc<-forecast(training_plc)
fc_training_plc %>%
  forecast(h=15) %>%
  autoplot() +autolayer(test_plc)
```

```{r}
fc_training_plc
```

```{r}
fc_plc<-forecast(plc)
fc_plc %>%
forecast(h=30) %>%
  autoplot()
```

```{r}
fc_plc
```
